directions: In a food processor, place cream cheese, sour cream, garlic, cilantro and shrimp. Mix until smooth. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Transfer to a medium serving dish. Chill covered in the refrigerator at least 2 hours before serving.
ingredients: 1 (6.5 ounce) can small shrimp, liquid reserved
title: Secret Shrimp Dip
